title: AMX-30
description: The AMX-30 was a French main battle tank designed during the 1960s.
history: It was created after a failed project with Germany to produce a common tank between the two nations.

variants.name: AMX-30 (1st Prototype)
variants.description: First prototype of the AMX-30

variants.name: AMX-30 (2nd Prototype)
variants.description: Second prototype of the AMX-30

variants.name: AMX-30A
variants.description: Final pre-production prototype of the AMX-30

variants.name: AMX-30B
variants.description: First production series of the AMX-30

variants.name: AMX-30B1
variants.description: Improved export version used by Chile

variants.name: AMX-30B2
variants.description: Upgraded model of the AMX-30B, featuring a new turret, engine, transmission and suspension

variants.name: AMX-30 ACRA
variants.description: AMX-30 with a 142 mm ACRA gun, inspired by the M60A2 'Starship'

variants.name: AMX-30B2 Brenus
variants.description: Up-armored AMX-30B2, covered in ERA bricks to defeat HEAT projectiles

variants.name: AMX-30 Entrainement
variants.description: AMX-30 with it's turret removed to make space for an instructor cabin, used to train new pilots

variants.name: AMX-30B2 FORAD
variants.description: AMX-30B2 modified to appear as an enemy tank for training

variants.name: AMX-30B2 Brenus FORAD
variants.description: AMX-30B2 Brenus modified to appear as an enemy tank for training

variants.name: AMX-30 Basic
variants.description: Simplified model made for exports

variants.name: AMX-30S
variants.description: Tropicalized export model of the AMX-30B, sold to Saudi Arabia and Qatar

variants.name: AMX-30C2
variants.description: Modernized AMX-30B meant for export

variants.name: AMX-30E
variants.description: Initial licensed AMX-30 manufactured by Spain

variants.name: AMX-30E M1
variants.description: Improved AMX-30E with a new transmission

variants.name: AMX-30E M2
variants.description: Improved AMX-30E M1 with a new power plant, rangefinder and ammunition

variants.name: AMX-30V
variants.description: AMX-30B sold to Venezuela, with a new engine

variants.name: AMX-30SA
variants.description: Anti-air vehicle based on the AMX-30 featuring two 30 mm guns

variants.name: AMX-30 Javelot
variants.description: Anti-air prototype based on the AMX-30 featuring a unique multiple rocket launcher

variants.name: AMX-30C1 Shahine
variants.description: Anti-air vehicle based on the AMX-30 using the SA-10 Shahine

variants.name: AMX-30R
variants.description: Anti-air vehicle based on the AMX-30 using the Roland missile system

variants.name: AMX-30 EBG F1
variants.description: Military engineering vehicle based on the AMX-30

variants.name: AMX-30 EBG VAL
variants.description: Modernized AMX-30 EBG F1, based on the AMX-30

related.name: AMX-30 AuF1
related.description: Self-propelled gun based on the AMX-30 chassis

related.name: AMX-32
related.description: Proposed export version, with two prototypes

related.name: AMX-40
related.description: Last attempt from GIAT to export the AMX-30 chassis
